name: Meltys Quest
description: Princess Meltys spent all her life fooling around while living in the lap of luxury. One day the dastardly Grolido Monster Empire upsets her way of life. Now she sets out on a passionate journey to restore her kingdom, but what pit stops will she make along the way?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2+ GHz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Might experience a few seconds of lag accessing menus or loading new maps if your CPU is old. Turn off other programs before running.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3+ GHz processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended.
